Attrition.description: Whether the employee left the company or not (Yes, No).

value_dict.No: The employee stayed at the company.

Department.description: The department in which the employee works.

value_dict.Sales: The employee works in the Sales department.
value_dict.Research & Development: The employee works in the Research & Development department.
value_dict.Human Resources: The employee works in the Human Resources department.

DistanceFromHome.description: The distance from work to home (in miles).

Education.description: The level of education of the employee.

EducationField.description: The field of study of the employee.

value_dict.Life Sciences: The employee studied in the field of Life Sciences.
value_dict.Other: The employee studied in a field not listed here.
value_dict.Medical: The employee studied in the Medical field.
value_dict.Marketing: The employee studied in the field of Marketing.
value_dict.Technical Degree: The employee has a Technical Degree.
value_dict.Human Resources: The employee studied in the field of Human Resources.

EnvironmentSatisfaction.description: The level of satisfaction with the work environment.

JobSatisfaction.description: The level of satisfaction with the job.

MaritalStatus.description: The marital status of the employee.

MonthlyIncome.description: The monthly income of the employee (in dollars).

NumCompaniesWorked.description: The number of companies the employee has worked for.

YearsAtCompany.description: The number of years the employee has worked at the company.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in employee retention analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict if the employee left or stayed at the company.
prompt.answer_prompt: Left the company[0] or stayed at the company[1]?

class_value_dict.No: The employee stayed at the company.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in job satisfaction analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the level of job satisfaction.
prompt.answer_prompt: Low[0], Medium[1], High[2] or Very High[3]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in work-life balance analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the work-life balance.
